answers.answer: If this is new, be sure to get checked for diabetes or thyroid condition and things along those lines.  Dry sex is not good for women and sets them up for uncomfortable infections.  One technique that might help is having the woman hold the base of your penis tight with a finger while you have intercourse, if there is enough length in her arm and your member to allow it.  There are herbs that might intensify the experience, such as L-arginine and pumpkin seed oil pills, things like that.
A woman that is really good at kegals is what you need. That way she can keep a firmer grip on you the entire time.

It gets to the point of numbness and I have to soak them in warm water to regain feeling.I was told that it could be thryroid related and I had numerous tests done on regular basis. But nothing showed up along those lines, maybe I should look into it further.

question: I am a male that hasn't been with many sexual partners, however I'm becoming increasingly frustrated since I can't orgasm easily by vaginal sex due lack of stimulation.  I found that I need a handjob with intense friction and a very strong grip to orgasm.  I also found that having a dryer vagina provides more sensation on my penis allowing for orgasm.  Where as when I use lube for hand jobs or a well lubricated vagina provides very little stimulation on my penis.How do I increase my penile sensitivity so that I can more easily achieve orgasm through traditional vaginal sex?
title: Need intense Friction to Orgasm
